title: Interpretation of a dream about bathing and seeing bathing in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a bath in a dream for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, whether she is naked or with clothes on, with someone in front of people with soap and shampoo in the street in the bathroom according to Ibn Sirin and others. Interpretation of bathing in a dream. Whoever dreams of bathing for the sake of beauty, purity, and cleanliness, this indicates that he has morals. High, great faith and forgiveness, and he obeys his parents and is tolerant. Whoever dreams of bathing from impurity to purify himself in a dream, this indicates his beautiful character, religion, and deep faith in God, and he continues to perform duties and worship, asks for forgiveness, and obeys his parents. Whoever sees that he is bathing in order to perform the circumambulation of the Hajj rituals in a dream, then this It indicates the expansion of his diet, and that he is constantly trying to earn a lot of halal money. Whoever dreams that he washes his hands with water and soap, this indicates that he owes him large debts and pays them to their owners, and he has none of these debts left. Whoever dreams that he is bathing for ihram in Mecca, this indicates It indicates joy and happiness for him and that he will be relieved of the material obligations assigned to him or that he will meet people who have been absent from him for a long time and will be happy to meet them. Whoever is without a mind becomes angry with illness and sees that he is bathing in a dream, this indicates that he will recover from his illness and return to his mind and nature. Whoever dreams that he Bathing in cold water in the winter, this indicates the misfortune of its owner. He is worried and a great calamity will befall him. His work, money, and health await him. And whoever is single, that is, not married, and sees that he bathed on the day of Eid and had a good dream, this indicates a close relationship, meaning marriage to a friend. Purity and dignity. If a person is sick and sees himself bathing and wearing new clothes and appears handsome in a dream, this indicates recovery from illness, health and prosperity for him. Anyone who has been in prison and sees himself bathing and wearing beautiful clothes in a dream, this indicates that he will emerge from his prison He will meet his family and loved ones after a period of imprisonment and being away from them. And whoever sees that he is bathing in a dream, this indicates the goodness and fertility of the earth, and indicates heavy rain falling on the earth and the return of its youth. And whoever dreams that he is performing ablution in a dream, this indicates that he returned the things that he took unlawfully, so he returned them. God to him. Whoever dreams that he is bathing in hot water in the summer, this indicates great sadness and a great calamity * that will befall the dreamer. Whoever sees that he is washing a dead person in his dream, this indicates that there are corrupt people on earth and he gives them advice and calls them to goodness and that they repent to God in sincere repentance and agree. To return to God. Whoever dreams that he is bathing and throwing stones in a Hajj dream, this indicates that there is someone waiting for him with a conspiracy and he will escape from it, and God will save him from all his enemies. Whoever is not in Islam and sees that he is bathing in a dream, this indicates his conversion to Islam and the saying of the Shahada, but he does not believe. Except in God, who has no partner. Whoever dreams that a deceased person asks him to wash his clothes in a dream, this indicates that the deceased wants his family to pray for mercy and forgiveness and oppose his soul. Interpretation of a bathroom in a dream for a single woman: Entering a public or communal bathroom without a shower is considered a

preview.html: Spinach is a seasonal vegetable and is very rich in iron, which is important for people with anemia and iron deficiency in the blood, when seeing spinach in a dream. Spinach also contains many nutrients, vitamins, and minerals, in addition to percentages of fats, proteins, and minerals. The homeland of spinach is Asia. Spinach is eaten raw and cooked and belongs to the beet or Syrian beet family. Seeing leafy spinach means good luck and collecting money. It also indicates the fulfillment of hopes and good news. It also indicates positive changes in the dreamer’s life and an improvement in the dreamer’s circumstances in the near future. Cutting spinach in a dream for a single woman. Seeing yourself cutting spinach is one of the good dreams that means something good. Seeing spinach in a dream to fulfill dreams and desires. It also indicates good luck and positive changes for the pioneer. Dreaming of green spinach. Seeing green spinach is a good vision and seeing green leafy vegetables in general is good and a lot of nutrition. Seeing spinach in a dream and seeing cooked spinach means money and many good things for the pioneer. For a pregnant woman, it is a good vision and indicates the approach and ease of childbirth, as well as the birth of a child. Healthy and healthy from the disease. Interpretation of a dream about eating cooked spinach for a married woman: Seeing spinach in a dream, a dream about eating cooked spinach for a married woman has many indicators and all of them are good. This vision indicates recovery from illness if the dreamer is sick, and if she is pregnant, it indicates an easy birth. But if a married woman sees that she is cutting spinach in a dream, this means that she will get rid of the worries and problems that she suffers from. Cooking spinach also indicates the end of disputes. Marital and a sense of stability in married life. Dreaming of cutting spinach in a dream. Seeing spinach in a dream. Seeing spinach in a dream for a married woman about to become pregnant. It also indicates the acquisition of money and positive and radical changes in the dreamer’s life. Dreaming of cloves and spinach in a dream. Seeing green spinach in a dream means blessings, health, and money. The birth of a child for someone who has not yet given birth, and spinach with molokhiya indicates the blessing of money, health, and abundance of blessings. This vision may also indicate that some people hate the dreamer, but the dreamer will not be insulted or harmed. A dream of cooking spinach in a dream for a single woman. Seeing spinach in a dream is a vision Spinach in the dream of an unmarried woman symbolizes the approach of marrying a man with a respectable personality. Also, seeing cooked spinach in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates success and success in practical life. It also indicates successful social relationships. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person giving me spinach. Seeing spinach in a dream And whoever sees that she is giving dead spinach, this indicates the arrival of goodness, blessing, and abundance. Interpretation of a dream about a spinach leaf for a married woman: Spinach, in a dream, means for a married woman a safe and stable life, taking care of her family and children.

title: Interpretation of the dream of the name Fatima in a dream

preview.html: The name Fatima is one of the most beautiful names carried by Fatima Al-Zahra, daughter of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace. What a person has left behind in his life. A girl named Fatima has intelligence, strength, and is able to bear responsibility. She is very close to God Almighty. Also, the name Fatima indicates that its owner is sincere and sincere and makes an effort in striving to achieve her goals. As much as we do. Find out how you see the name Fatima in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about fried bread in a dream. Interpretation of the name Fatima in an unmarried girl’s dream. If an unmarried girl sees the name Fatima in her dream, this is one of the good dreams that indicate blessings and the arrival of news that will please her. It is also said that seeing the name Fatima Fatima in her dream symbolizes her future marriage. Dream jurists interpreted that an unmarried girl who sees the name Fatima in her dream indicates that her future husband has good qualities and good morals and will make her very happy. Good news for an unmarried woman who sees the name Fatima in the breadth of livelihood and abundant money that came to her. From God Almighty. Eliminate the problems and crises that a girl suffers from when she sees the name Fatima in a dream. If an unmarried girl sees the name Fatima in her dream, this symbolizes her honesty and intense love for her parents and her attachment to them. Interpretation of seeing a property in a dream in detail. The meaning of seeing the name Fatima In a married woman’s dream: When a married woman sees the name Fatima in her dream, this dream indicates an extension of her strength and blessings in her life. Also, this vision in a married woman’s dream promises good news that she has given birth to a new baby. Explain her vision of the name Fatima for a new life full of positive changes and lasting happiness. For her. If a married woman sees the name Fatima in a dream, this means that her husband loves her and believes in her, as well as for her children. This vision also symbolizes the stability and reassurance that a married woman enjoys in her married life. Interpretation of seeing Satan in a dream and seeking refuge from him for single and pregnant women. The name Fatima in a dream Pregnant woman: Interpretation of the dream of molokhiya in a dream for single and pregnant women in detail. If a pregnant woman sees the name Fatima in her dream, this means that she will get pregnant without any problems. This vision also symbolizes that her birth process will be easy and pain-free, God willing. And seeing the name Fatima in a pregnant woman’s dream Evidence that the newborn will bring sustenance and blessings for her, her husband, and her children. She explained that seeing the name Fatima is evidence of her freedom from the crises and problems that she suffered from in her life. If a pregnant woman sees the name Fatima in her dream, this means that the newborn will be female, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about gambling. In a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail. Seeing the name Fatima in the dream of a man and an unmarried young man. Interpretation of the dream of sewing in a dream for a woman and a man in detail. If a man sees the name Fatima in his dream, it means that he will have a prominent position in society. And also that God will bless him with righteous children. This The vision in a man’s dream is good news that he will get rid of the worries that he suffered a lot from and that caused him great sadness. Seeing the name Fatima was interpreted in...

title: Interpretation of a dream about a rabbit in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a rabbit in a dream for individuals and various other cases. Rabbits are among the pets that people love in life. Rabbits have many types and shapes, and each shape and color has a specific explanation and interpretation in the dream. Today, in our article on the encyclopedia website, we will learn about the interpretation and interpretation of a rabbit in a dream for a single girl, a married woman, and a pregnant woman. And its interpretation in all cases. Interpretation of a rabbit in a dream for one girl: The rabbit in a dream for one girl has many interpretations, such as: If the girl sees a brown rabbit in her dream, this is evidence that the dreamer is facing some problems in her life due to delayed marriage and such problems. If she sees A rabbit with a black balloon in her dream, this is evidence that the dreamer will succeed in her field of work and studies and will reach the highest positions. And if she sees in her dream a rabbit with a white balloon, this is evidence of kindness and marriage to a good husband soon, and God knows best. Interpretation of a rabbit for a married woman in a dream: Rabbit In a married woman’s dream, there is evidence that she is suffering from problems with her marriage partner and that she is dissatisfied with life with him. Dreaming of a small white rabbit is a sign of goodness and prosperity, and that God will bless the dreamer with succession and righteous offspring of boys and girls, and God knows best. Interpretation of a rabbit for a woman Pregnant in a dream: The scholar in the world of dream interpretation, Ibn Shaheen, said that a pregnant woman who sees rabbits in her dream that are beautiful in appearance and appearance, and this is evidence that the dreamer will give her a baby and it will be a good child. And morals and religion, and he will be very handsome and shining in his face, and God knows best. Interpretation of a brown balloon in a dream: The brown rabbit in a dream shows kindness, dignity, honor, and the owner of the dream. Interpretation of a rabbit’s kiss in a dream: Whoever sees in his dream that he is kissing a rabbit, this is evidence that the dreamer is a good man who treats His family in a way that pleases God and he loves his wife very much. And if he is single, then this is evidence that he fears God, is kinship-related, and is righteous, and God knows best. Interpretation of hunting a rabbit in a dream: Whoever sees in his dream that he is hunting rabbits and succeeds, this is evidence of the dreamer, and he will grant him May God grant him great success in the field of work and grant him a lot of money through work or inheritance. And God knows best. Interpretation of seeing white rabbits in a dream: White rabbits for a man or woman in a dream indicate that the dreamer will suffer from injustice from his employer, but he must be patient to obtain his rights, and God knows best. Interpretation of a black balloon rabbit in a dream: The rabbit, which is a balloon, indicates Black for a man and a woman in a dream, indicates that the dreamer has a high level of intelligence and is a successful person. It also indicates the disappearance of worries, problems and sadness, great joy and good will from God, and God knows best. The best thing you can say about a rabbit in a dream: A rabbit in a dream indicates Kindness and sustenance for men and women. A rabbit in a dream for a person is evidence of a good lady and also shows a successful business that he works in, money and contentment, and also indicates good children and a beautiful life. The worst thing that is said about a rabbit in a dream: In some dreams

title: Interpretation of the vision of killing a gecko in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Sirin, and Imam Al-Sadiq.

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the slaughter of geckos in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Sirin, and Imam Al-Sadiq. It is a reptile that lives in deserts and farms as well as in homes. And it can change its color to hide from those who want to kill them, so in this article today we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing the killing of a goose in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of a dream of seeing the killing of a gecko in a dream, Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation. In what the scholar Ibn Shaheen narrated about killing a goose in a dream, we mention the following: Seeing the killing of a large gecko indicates the death of worries and pains from the dreamer’s life. Killing some geckos means that the dreamer’s situation will change for the better, it is good news. The dreamer who raises a gecko in his house in a dream shows the difficulty and misery of his children in raising and evaluating them. As for the visionary who cooks a cart in his dream, it indicates that he is trying to achieve something he desires but fails to do it, and it also indicates the dreamer’s illness. Ibn Sirin says that the harvest in the house is a devil because it was blowing fire on our master Ibrahim, peace be upon him, or driving him crazy because of the lightness and speed of its movements. A gecko in a dream symbolizes magic and envy, and all its types are poisonous and it takes a lot of effort to kill it and inflict Defeat him. Sometimes the dream of horror indicates the corruption of the dreamer and the corruption of his situation. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a lizard in a dream, interpretation of Imam al-Sadiq. The vision of harvesting in a dream can be interpreted according to what Imam Jaafar al-Sadiq narrated in the following points: Whoever sees in his dream a deviation that he looked at is an enemy who follows him, waits for him and harms him. The bellies of the house symbolize the suffering of the people of this house of envy for all the good blessings that God has bestowed upon them. The gecko’s attempt to reach the dreamer’s house indicates that the dreamer befriends people who are not fair and hypocrites who conspire against him. Killing the dreamer to help him in a dream indicates the great good that will come to him in the next life, and will alleviate his worries and remove his distress. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a gecko in a dream for a single woman, interpretation of Ibn Sirin. According to what Ibn Sirin said about seeing the belly of a single woman in her sleep, we have revealed the following: Seeing a gecko in a dream indicates that there are bad people in her life who talk badly about her and wish her harm. The single woman who sees a gecko running in her dream indicates She enters into an emotional relationship that has no interest and it is better to stop it. Killing an unmarried woman in a dream symbolizes the pain and distress that he was suffering from, but he got rid of it thanks to God. In general, the person in the dream shows hypocrisy, envy and magic. Ibn Sirin says that seeing a married woman being stabbed indicates problems facing her family, which are often related to money and the husband. Killing a married woman for the sake of a burden means getting rid of worries and problems in her life, even if she has a debt, God Almighty helped her to fulfill it. Seeing a goose in a dream trying to escape from God means that there is a criminal who committed a crime against God and is trying to escape from it. While the dreamer's fear of leprosy and escaping from it indicates the weakness of his faith and lack of

The bellies of the house symbolize the suffering of the people of this envious house for all the good blessings that God has granted them. It indicates the gecko’s attempt to reach To the dreamer’s house indicates that the dreamer befriends people who are not fair and hypocritical who conspire against him. Killing the dreamer for helping him in a dream indicates the great good that will come to him in the next life, alleviating his worries and removing his distress. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a gecko in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin, according to what This was said by Ibn Shirin regarding seeing the belly of a single woman in her sleep. We have revealed the following: Seeing a gecko in a dream indicates that there are bad people in her life who speak ill of her and wish her harm. A single woman who sees a gecko running in her dream indicates that she is entering into a relationship. Emotional, it has no interest and it is better to stop it. Killing an unmarried woman in a dream symbolizes the pain and anguish that he was suffering from, but he got rid of her by the grace of God. In general, a person in a dream shows hypocrisy, envy, and witchcraft. Ibn Sirin says that a married woman seeing a prick indicates To problems facing her family, which are often related to money and her husband. Killing a married woman for the sake of a burden means getting rid of worries and problems in her life, even if she has a debt, which God Almighty will help her fulfill. Seeing a goose in a dream trying to escape from God means that there is A criminal committed a crime against God and is trying to escape from it. While the dreamer’s fear of leprosy and escaping from it indicates the weakness of his faith and lack of

title: Interpretation of a dream about taking pictures with the dead in a dream and its consequences

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about taking pictures with the dead, the interpretation of this dream is certain that it looks very good or may indicate the possibility of harm and damage to the person who sees it, and this is due to the details of this dream, as well as according to the condition that this person lives in, and it should be noted that the interpretation also differs according to the gender of the dreamer, so we will present in this article the interpretation of a dream about taking pictures with the deceased. In addition to clarifying all the symbols that this dream may contain. Interpretation of a dream about taking pictures with the dead There is no doubt that death is a painful event in the lives of all people, because it works to separate and cause great sadness, and we will put in your hands the most important interpretations about this vision as follows: In general, the interpretation of this dream is due to the emergence of problems, disturbances and fears for the dreamer. As there are some rumors and conflicting opinions about it. This dream in a dream refers to the bad things and events that may happen to the person who sees the problems, worries and problems. In the event that the dreamer takes a picture with a deceased relative. There is no doubt that this symbolizes the presence of worries in the dreamer's life. While this vision shows to a married woman that she is suffering from problems, obstacles and crises in life with her husband and children. Likewise, an unmarried girl who sees herself photographing the deceased, this may indicate that she will face problems in her coming days. Interpretation of a dream about taking pictures See also: Interpretation of seeing someone photographing me in a dream for a single woman Interpretation of seeing cut pictures of the dead in a dream In fact, cutting the picture increases the feeling of sadness, because this leads to Losing old memories that cannot be replaced, as for the dream of cutting pictures, we will explain its interpretation in the following points: Cutting pictures of the dead in a dream indicates separation and oblivion. If the dreamer cuts the picture of the deceased from his family, this symbolizes severing kinship ties. However, if the vision states that the deceased in the dream cuts pictures of joy attributed to the dreamer, this indicates divorce or separation. While burning pictures in a dream is the desire to end old memories. It should be noted that the act of burning itself indicates the emergence and emergence of disasters. In the event that the deceased burns the dreamer's pictures in a dream. This undoubtedly symbolizes the dispute between the dreamer and his family. Interpretation of a dream about taking pictures See also: Interpretation of seeing pictures in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail Interpretation of seeing a picture in a dream The dreamer in a dream tries to take many pictures of the dead, because the dead is dear to him and he wishes to see him constantly in a dream, so we will explain the interpretation of this dream as follows: If the dreamer lives in an uncomfortable place or house, where he does not feel comfort, calm and stability. Then he saw that he was taking a picture of himself or that someone else was taking a picture of himself. There is no doubt that this is a sign However, God Almighty will save him from this noise, boredom and turmoil in which he is. Moreover, he will soon move to a more comfortable place where he can achieve his ambitions, hopes and dreams for the future. Also, this dream can confirm the dreamer’s desire to be different, as he is looking for

title: Interpretation of dreams to see a lion chasing me in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a lion chasing me in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing a person in a dream quarreling violently with a lion, this indicates the sins he commits and does not repent for, and God knows best. Seeing a lion attacking him and chasing him indicates a serious illness affecting the dreamer and indicates the death of a member of his family. Also, seeing a lion A married woman chasing me in a dream indicates the cessation of strikes and worries, and it also indicates victory and victory, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a lion chasing me in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl dreams that she is fighting a lion, this indicates victory over her enemies and friends who are harming her. Also, seeing a lion He quarrels with an unmarried girl and the girl ignores him. This indicates the goodness of marrying a man she loves very much, and God knows best. Watching a fight between a lion and an unmarried girl shows different things that a girl does in her life and her happiness. Also, seeing a lion in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates her fear of a certain thing. Then it goes away, as it indicates the collapse of disputes and misfortunes. Interpretation of seeing a lion chasing me in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is attacking a lion, this indicates victory in her life and happiness and success that will come to her. Seeing a lion in a dream for a married woman, this means that Her husband joins a good and new job, but it is difficult and exhausting, and this vision shows an extensive diet. Interpretation of seeing a lion chasing me in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman in her dream that she is attacking a lion for victory indicates that the pain of childbirth has passed, and the ease of her birth and the imminence of her due date. This vision also indicates To the end of her worries, a happy life, and the elimination of all enemies of many friends and close ones. Interpretation of seeing a lion chasing me in a dream for a man: If a married man dreams that he is attacking a lion, this indicates his success, prosperity, and close marriage, and God knows best. Also, seeing a lion in a dream for men means strength, flexibility, and cruelty that He will find himself in it and repent to God Almighty. Also, seeing a lion attacking a person, this vision indicates the financial crises that the viewer is going through, and the many accumulated debts, and God knows best. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you. As soon as possible.

title: Dream of defending a cause in a dream or dream

preview.html: The interpretation of the dream depends on knowing the details and what happened in the court, seeing the summons and hearing the ruling, and this is what we present in detail in the dream interpretation of the trial, the lawsuit, the judge and the case. A dream about defending a case in a dream The court appears in a dream Global and the following. Anyone who dreams of being inside the courtroom indicates the beginning of A new experience in his life. As for someone who dreams that he is defending a cause, this is an indication that he is discussing an important topic in his life, which may be a trip, a wedding, or a new project at work. This also means that the dreamer has wisdom, intelligence, and tactics and defends others and provides them with assistance. Meaning Seeing a court note in a dream: A man who dreams of seeing a court note in a dream indicates starting a new business, but it needs permission and official documents. It may indicate the presence of the viewer or his intention to go to one of the government departments and agencies to complete the work and papers for his benefit. The meaning of seeing yourself begging in a dream is when a man dreams that he is in Prayer and sees the request and receives the judge's perfection. His happiness indicates that a misfortune has occurred to him that makes him feel extremely sad. The dream of the court in Ibn Sirin's dream. When we dream that we see the court in a dream, this is evidence of the wisdom of the observer, the nature of the law, and his determination to apply justice in all his affairs and dealings. Whoever dreams of sitting in the courtroom with a chain From Issues It is an indicator of issues related to conscience in the society in which the dreamer lives. The meaning of dreaming about crime in a dream When a person dreams that he sees a crime committed in a dream and that he is standing before a judge to be tried, the vision is a warning that there is a misfortune that will happen to the major and he needs to act better to get out of it. Who sees the court Crowded with people, this means that the dreamer will hear good news. The meaning of seeing an empty courtroom in a dream: The dream of seeing the court in a dream indicates an important decision in the dreamer’s life. As for the one who watches an empty courtroom in his dream, it is a strong indication that he is suffering from great persecution and injustice. Add the dream that you would like to interpret, indicating the situation. Social media in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: A prayer for my deceased husband. Beautiful 1442 prayers for my deceased husband

preview.html: A prayer for the deceased husband. A beautiful prayer for my deceased husband. There is no doubt that death is the greatest calamity in the world, and God mentioned it in the Holy Qur’an. It can appear suddenly without any introduction and without illness. Until time ends, this is fate, and God alone knows the unseen and death is at His hands, which is the depressing isolation of the soul. Some of you have died before and some of you have returned to the dearest of lives. Anyone can lose someone with great love, and suddenly fall, fall, and fall to their death from one moment to the next. She lives in graveyards after living in palaces, and a woman may lose her husband and leave her children in the prime of life, and the shock is terrible and severe for her, but she must return and return to God and ask God Almighty. patience. On my website. A prayer for the deceased husband. A prayer for my deceased husband. Oh God, feed my husband with the fruits of Paradise and drink from the Kawthar River. Oh God, give him a chance in his grave, and open for him a door from which the breezes of heaven will not be blocked. My Lord, forgive him and have mercy on him, O Most Merciful. Oh God, my husband's grave smells like heaven. Oh God, have mercy on the soul when it rests and my heart is not satisfied with His love. May God have mercy on this pure, sleeping body. May God shower my husband with peace, mercy and forgiveness, and may God make him one of your happy servants. May God have mercy on my husband. It's the most precious thing I've ever lost. My Lord, I miss his smile, so make him smile, O Lord, in Your highest Paradise. Oh God, make Paradise his home and residence. O God, have mercy on the one who has no sun or moon to illuminate his darkness. Prayer for the deceased husband on Friday Upon hearing the news of death, a person may become astonished, sad, expressive, weep and weep. Sadness comes from losing a person, not seeing him or talking to him again and with them, and moving to another place under the dirt, but after a while this body disappears and nothing remains of it except the dust that revives it. God Almighty again on the Day of Resurrection and that this state came late and is a state of death in a terrible state that requires faith in Him. God, patience, and compliance with God’s command. O Lord, my heart gets narrow every time and dies. O God, have mercy on my heart, and you, O strong heart, O Lord, have mercy on me, my patience, and my comfort. . Oh God, have mercy on my husband and make his time in your paradise more beautiful. A prayer for my deceased husband Twitter When the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, passed by a grave and found a woman crying in the grave and mourning a dead and sad person, he said to her: Be patient with the first shock, and the woman said to you about me as long as it lasts. I do not suffer from my misfortune. When he took it and went, he was told that he was the Messenger of God. He says: To God we belong and to Him we shall return, and we entrust his affairs to God, and he asks God for patience. Oh God, have mercy on my dear husband and make Paradise the highest heaven. O God, have mercy on those who live in graves and leave their families and homes, for You are the Almighty, the Forgiving. Oh God, accept him a little and neglect his laziness. Oh God, make his illness an atonement for all his sins. And make the last martyrdom the martyrdom of the world. Oh God, confirm this with steadfast speech, raise his rank, forgive his sins, and balance his scales. Oh God, consider it a mere calculation, for He is more merciful than His servants and more merciful than a mother with her child. Oh God, deprive him of his flesh, blood, and skin in Hell. Oh God, open the doors of your paradise and the doors of your mercy, O God. Oh God, forgive him until there is no forgiveness left. Oh God, please
